description: Example requests for the QR Code Generation API

examples.name: Generate QR Code for Offer with Default Data
examples.description: Generates a QR code for offer ID 1 with default size of 300px. The QR code will contain structured offer information including title, description, organization, validity, and location data.

examples.name: Generate QR Code for Offer with Custom Data
examples.description: Generates a QR code for offer ID 1 with custom data (URL) and size of 500px. The QR code will contain the custom URL instead of the default structured data.

examples.name: Generate Small QR Code
examples.description: Generates a smaller QR code (150px) for offer ID 2, suitable for mobile displays or small print materials.

response_example.title: Special Discount
response_example.name: Special Discount Offer
response_example.termsAndConditions: Valid until December 31, 2024. Cannot be combined with other offers.

usage_notes: The QR code data is returned as a base64-encoded PNG image string
If no customData is provided, the QR code contains structured JSON with offer information
Size parameter accepts values between 1 and 1000 pixels
The QR code can be used for sharing offers, tracking usage, or providing quick access to offer details
The response includes both the QR code image and the complete offer details for reference
